description: Try our easy to follow Pear & Walnut Tarts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pear & Walnut Tarts Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large Packham pears, peeled, cored and cut into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Line a baking tray with baking paper.
Cut each sheet of pastry into 4 squares.
Place 4 squares onto baking tray and top with the remaining 4 squares.
Heat butter in a frying pan. Add cinnamon and walnuts and toss until walnuts are golden. Remove from pan.
Add pear wedges and fry until tender and golden.
Arrange pear slices and walnuts on the pastry squares and drizzle with honey. Bake for 2025 minutes until pastry is puffed and golden.
Serve with a dollop of thickened cream.
